1001: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
Madam! We just received a report about Houkai creature activities detected near the base. A patrol investigation has been requested.
报告！在哨站发来情报，在基地附近发现崩坏生物活动迹象，希望巡逻队可以在巡逻时调查一下。
報告！見張り所からの情報で、基地付近に崩壊生物の活動した痕跡を発見したようです。パトロール時に調査をしてほしいとのことです。
보고! 감시초소 정보에 따르면 기지 근처에 붕괴 생물의 활동 흔적이 발견된 것 같습니다. 순찰 시 조사를 부탁드린다고 합니다.
Report!!! The watchtower has informed us that they have found traces of active Honkai Beasts near the base. They would like us to investigate during the next patrol.
Report! Information was sent in at the outpost that signs of collapsing creature activity were found near the base, so hopefully patrols can investigate while on patrol.
Report!!! The watchtower has informed us that they have found traces of active decay organisms near the base. They would like us to investigate when we are on patrol.
speaker
portraits
msg
Understood. Since Bronya is not here. We'll take care of it.
明白了，既然姐姐大人不在了，巡逻的任务就交给我们吧~
わかったわ。お姉ちゃんがいない以上、パトロールの任務は私たちに任せてちょうだい！
알았어. 언니가 없는 이상 순찰 임무는 우리에게 맡겨!
Alright. Since Bronya is gone, you can leave the patrol duty to us!
Understood, since the sister-sama is not in, the task of patrol will be left to us ~
All right, I get it. As long as your sister is gone, you leave the patrol duty to us!
msg
Let's go! This is our first patrol mission, let's make sure we do our best!
走吧！第一次的巡逻任务，可要打起精神了哦~
行きましょう！初めてのパトロール任務よ。張り切ってちょうだいね！
출발하자! 첫 순찰 임무야. 열심히 해보자구!
Let's go! It's our first patrol assignment. You've got to be on top of your game!
Let's go! The first patrol mission, you have to play the spirit ~
Let's go! It's my first patrol assignment. You've got to be on top of your game!
1002: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
So, I'll explain the objectives of this task.
那么我来说明一下这次任务的内容吧。
じゃあ、今回のパトロール任務の内容を説明するよ。
그럼 이번 순찰 임무 내용을 설명해줄게.
Alright, let me explain what this patrol mission is all about.
So let me explain what this mission is all about.
Okay, let me explain what this patrol mission is all about.
msg
In a patrol mission, first you will need to investigate the target area, then neutralize any Houkai targets you've found, or report back to the base about any detected threat.
巡逻任务顾名思义就是巡查基地附近战区是否有来自崩坏生物的威胁，发现威胁并消灭或是报告威胁，是最基本的任务。
パトロール任務はその名の通り、基地付近の戦闘エリアに崩壊生物の脅威がないかを見回るの。脅威を見つけたら消滅させるか、基地に報告するの。これは最も基本的な任務よ。
순찰 임무는 이름 그대로 기지 근처 전투 지역에 붕괴 생물의 위협이 없는지 순찰하는 거예요. 위협을 발견하면 소멸시키거나 기지에 보고해야 해요. 이건 가장 기본적인 임무죠.

Patrol missions, as the name implies, involve patrolling the combat area near the base for any threats from Honkai Beasts. If a threat is found, it is either eliminated or reported to the base. This is the most basic mission.

Patrol mission as the name implies is to inspect the base near the war zone whether there is a threat from the crash creatures, find the threat and destroy or report the threat, is the most basic task.

Patrol missions, as the name implies, involve patrolling the combat area near the base for any threats from decaying organisms. If a threat is found, it is either eliminated or reported to the base. This is the most basic mission.
msg
It was Bronya who's taking care of the patrol missions near the base. Though it sounds simple, it could still get quite dangerous if something goes wrong.
原本基地附近的巡逻任务都是由姐姐大人负责的，虽然是最基本的任务，但是却隐藏着各种不确定因素，可是十分危险的。
元々、基地付近のパトロール任務はお姉ちゃんが担当していたの。基本の任務だけど、不確定要素も隠れているし、とても危険だからね。
원래 기지 근처 순찰 임무는 언니가 담당하고 있었어요. 기본적인 임무지만 불확정 요소도 숨어있고 매우 위험하니까요.
Originally, Bronya was in charge of patrol duty near the base. It's a fairly basic mission, but things can get ugly quickly if something comes up.
Originally, the patrol tasks near the base are responsible for the elder sister, although it is the most basic task, but hidden various uncertainties, but very dangerous.
Originally, my sister was in charge of patrol duty near the base. It's a basic mission, but there are hidden uncertainties and it's very dangerous.
msg
So, don't let your guard down.
所以不要以为是简单的任务就放松警惕了哦~
だから、簡単な任務だと思って警戒を緩めたりしないようにね！
그러니까 쉬운 임무라고 생각해서 경계를 늦추지 않도록 조심하세요!
So don't let your guard down thinking it's an easy assignment!
So do not think it is a simple task to let down your guard Oh ~
So don't let your guard down thinking it's an easy assignment!

Let's start our mission. Be careful and don't get hurt.
那么开始任务吧，小心不要受伤哦~
じゃあ任務の開始よ。ケガをしないように気を付けてね。
자 이제 임무를 시작해요. 다치지 않게 조심하세요.
Let's start the mission. Be careful not to get hurt.
Then start the task, be careful not to get hurt Oh ~

今日の所はこんなものね。特におかしな点は見つからなかったね。見張り所の言っていた崩壊生物の活動の痕跡って一体……。
오늘은 이 정도면 된 것 같네요. 특별히 이상한 점은 발견하지 못했어요. 감시소에서 말한 붕괴 생물의 활동 흔적이라는 게 대체......
That's all for today. I didn't encounter anything strange. Not sure why the lookout said something about signs of activity from Honkai beasts...
Today is almost like this, it seems that no abnormalities are found it, the sentinel station said the signs of collapse biological activity in the end is ......

Oh, I'm sorry. By new species, I mean newly discovered Honkai Beasts. They are very dangerous because there is no data on them, so you have to be extra careful.

Oh, I'm sorry. By new species, I mean recently born disintegrating organisms. They are very dangerous because there is no data on them, so you have to be extra careful.

不过幸好只是普通的猫，看来不用担心。

But I'm glad it's just a cat. I guess I didn't have to worry.
But fortunately it's just an ordinary cat, so it seems there's nothing to worry about.
But I'm glad it's just a cat. I guess I don't have to worry.

세계 전체가 붕괴의 영향으로 엉망이 되었지만, 이렇게 작은 생명도 우리와 같은 방식으로 끈질기게 살아가고 있는 거네.
This whole world is a wasteland after the Honkai, but even the smallest creatures haven't stopped fighting to survive just like us.
Although the whole world is falling apart under the impact of the collapse, but there are still such small life and we are as resilient to survive?
The whole world is in a mess from the collapse, but these little lives are just as tough as we are.

No. We have no time for a pet. If the cat can make it to this day, he certainly knows how to take care of himself.
不，我们可没有养宠物的余力，而且既然它能在崩坏中生存下来，就一定有自己的生存之道，不用我们去打扰它也能好好地活下来。
いえ、私たちにはペットを養う余力はないわ。それに崩壊の中で生き残っているのだから、きっと自分で生存するすべをもっているはず。私たちが余計なことをしなくてもしっかり生きていけると思う。
아니, 우리에겐 애완동물을 기를 여력이 없어. 게다가 붕괴 속에서 살아남은 거라면 분명 스스로 생존할 방법을 가지고 있을 테니. 우리가 쓸데없는 일을 하지 않아도 잘 살아갈 수 있을 거야.
No, we don't have the resources to be taking care of pets. And since they've been able to survive the Honkai, they must have been surviving on their own. I think they'll be fine without us.
No, we do not have the spare capacity to keep a pet, and since it can survive the collapse, it must have its own way of survival, and it can survive well without us bothering it.
